definition: to soak seeds (to make them germinate)

sentences.english: The invention discloses a rape drought-resistance seed-soaking agent and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开了一种油菜抗旱浸种剂及其制备方法。

sentences.english: The application of biogas slurry soaking seed on early rice production was conducted.
sentences.chinese: 进行了沼液浸种在早稻生产中的应用试验。

sentences.english: Soaking seeds combined with spraying in bloom stage could increase the production even more obviously.
sentences.chinese: 浸种并配合花期喷洒，则有更加明显的增产效果。

sentences.english: The best soaking duration varied with seed quality.
sentences.chinese: 有效的浸种时间因结缕草种子质量不同而异。

sentences.english: Biogas slurry soaking seed could control rice bakanae disease, improve its economical character and increase yield.
sentences.chinese: 进行了沼液浸种在早稻生产中的应用试验。

definition: to sprout/to come out (of seedling)/to bud
trichlorphon C4H8Cl3PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide/also called dipterex
to drill (i.e. plant seeds in spaced rows)
tiller (stem at the base of grass plants)
